sentences.english: And all bumblebees have tiny wings, relative to their body size.
sentences.chinese: 而所有的大黄蜂都只有相对其体形而言很小的翅膀。

sentences.english: Do you exercise to stay in shape?
sentences.chinese: 你们为了保持体形而锻炼吗？

sentences.english: Where once he looked roly-poly, he suddenly appeared in public with a normal build.
sentences.chinese: 他以前又矮又胖，却突然以正常体形出现在大家眼前。

sentences.english: Maybe I should get in shape.
sentences.chinese: 也许我是该恢复一下体形了。

sentences.english: This is the harness into which Mother must strap herself in order to display that perfect figure.
sentences.chinese: 这就是母亲为了展示她的优美体形所使用的束带。

sentences.english: It has a soft brushed finish, and is a gunmetal blue color.
sentences.chinese: 它有一个软笔触完成，是一种体形蓝色。

sentences.english: He was a big man with a cigar and a camel's-hair coat.
sentences.chinese: 那是一个抽着雪茄，穿着驼毛大衣，体形硕大的男人。

sentences.english: Whales live in the ocean, because the shape like a fish, many people call it the whale.
sentences.chinese: 鲸生活在海洋里，因为体形像鱼，许多人管它叫鲸鱼。

sentences.english: Indoor “Rock Gyms” are popular in the metroplex for staying in shape.
sentences.chinese: 用于保持体形的室内“攀岩场馆”在大城市非常流行。

sentences.english: Ben must have been a great big man.
sentences.chinese: 老班一定是一个体形硕大的巨人。

sentences.english: It keeps me in good shape.
sentences.chinese: 它能让我保持良好的体形。

sentences.english: She fit nicely on the over-sized pan.
sentences.chinese: 她的体形和这张超大锅刚好搭配。

sentences.english: Maitreya couch General larger body, waist and no waist and two types.
sentences.chinese: 弥勒榻一般体形较大，又有无束腰和有束腰两种类型。

sentences.english: His body was lean, yet very strong looking.
sentences.chinese: 他体形削瘦，但看起来却很强壮。

sentences.english: Performing each movement slowly allows you to concentrate on your form.
sentences.chinese: 很慢地做每个动作使你有可能集中注意于你的体形。

sentences.english: Cashmere goats are usually larger than Angoras .
sentences.chinese: 喀什米尔山羊通常比安哥拉山羊体形要大。

definition: height (of person)/length of clothing from shoulders to bottom (tailor or dressmaker's measure)
